pages.text: The world has a plethora of stones that comprise its features; ranging from the deepest caves to the tallest peaks, and all that lies in between.$(br2)Each biome seems to have its own unique set of stone, and the loose rocks that can be found on the surface of a biome reflect that. I should pay close attention to the surface if I'm trying

to find a certain stone. $(br2)Considering the usefulness of stone as both a building and a crafting material, I will make note of all the stones of this world.$(br2)Some stones are tougher than others; they will be listed from least to most tough. Some are also only found in special places or under special conditions; I will make note of that as well.
